nodes.bodyText: Keep in mind this includes the time waiting for a machine. Since it's a worker there should be available executors unless you launch it at an inopportune time.

nodes.bodyText: I am going to merge it now. We can update the time if we encounter the above issue.

nodes.bodyText: Since it's a job we'd run manually I don't think it really even needs a timeout as the person running it should keep an eye out, but agreed we can update it either way in the future.
